tag_list: coo, boomset, ticketing, online-events, mobile-ticketing, events
overview:
Mr. Igal Zakuto, a Co-Founder of Boomset, serves as the chief operating officer responsible for ensuring that business operations are efficient and effective and that proper management of resources, distribution of goods and services to customers, and analysis of queue systems are done to the highest standard.

Before founding Boomset; Igal has performed many different roles in various market leading companies. His resume includes major work experience at Goldman Sachs, KPMG and ArcelorMittal. Igal has received his Bachelors of Art from Tufts University in International Relations and Economics. Igalâ€™s education from Tufts University and past work experience enables him to have extensive knowledge to run day to day business needs of Boomset and attaining marketing goals. As well as his current role at KGCIS LLC; Igal also served as a non-compensated board member of Rozak AMD, a subsidiary of ArcelorMittal.
